mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CLASS_L ( CLASS_ID, MENTO_ID, CLASS_CTGR_CD, CLASS_DETAIL_CTGR_CD, CLASS_NM, CLASS_FILE_SEQNO, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_DSTN, CLASS_STRT_DATE, CLASS_STRT_TIME, CLASS_DRTN_TIME, CLASS_MAX_MTE, CLASS_PLACE, CLASS_CHARGE, CRE_DTTM ) VALUES( #{classId}, #{mentoId}, #{classCtgrCd}, #{classDetailCtgrCd}, #{classNm}, #{classFileSeqno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classTitle}, #{classDstn}, DATE_FORMAT(#{classStrtDate},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{classStrtTime}, #{classDrtnTime}, #{classMaxMte}, #{classPlace}, #{classCharge}, SYSDATE() )

INSERT INTO TB_CLASS_PROCESS_L ( CLASS_PROCESS_SEQNO, CLASS_ID, CLASS_PROCESS_TITLE, CLASS_PROCESS_DESC, CRE_DTTM ) VALUES( nextval('CS_PROC_SEQ'), #{classId}, #{classProcessTitle}, #{classProcessDesc}, SYSDATE() )

INSERT INTO TB_CLASS_DETAIL_L ( CLASS_DETAIL_SEQNO, CLASS_ID, CLASS_DETAIL_TITLE, CLASS_DETAIL_FILE_SEQNO, CRE_DTTM ) VALUES( nextval('CS_DTL_SEQ'), #{classId}, #{classDetailTitle}, #{classDetailFileSeqno}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CLASS_L SET
CLASS_NM = #{classNm},
CLASS_FILE_SEQNO = #{classFileSeqno},
CLASS_TITLE = #{classTitle},
CLASS_DSTN = #{classDstn},
CLASS_STRT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(#{classStrtDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),
CLASS_STRT_TIME = #{classStrtTime},
CLASS_DRTN_TIME = #{classDrtnTime},
CLASS_MAX_MTE = #{classMaxMte},
CLASS_PLACE = #{classPlace},
CLASS_CHARGE = #{classCharge},
UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE CLASS_ID = #{classId}

UPDATE TB_CLASS_DETAIL_L SET
CLASS_DETAIL_TITLE = #{classDetailTitle},
CLASS_DETAIL_FILE_SEQNO = #{classDetailFileSeqno},
UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE 1=1 AND CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND CLASS_DETAIL_SEQNO = #{classDetailSeqno}

UPDATE TB_CLASS_PROCESS_L SET
CLASS_PROCESS_TITLE = #{classProcessTitle},
CLASS_PROCESS_DESC = #{classProcessDesc},
UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE 1=1 AND CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND CLASS_PROCESS_SEQNO = #{classProcessSeqno}
UPDATE TB_CLASS_L SET UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE(), CLASS_CURRENT_MTE = CLASS_CURRENT_MTE + 1 WHERE CLASS_ID = #{classId}
UPDATE TB_MENTEE_CLASS_LIKE_L SET USE_YN = 'N' ,UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE CLASS_ID = #{classId}
UPDATE TB_CLASS_L SET USE_YN = 'N' ,UPT_DTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE CLASS_ID = #{classId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_ID AS classId ,C.CLASS_NM AS classNm ,C.CLASS_TITLE AS classTitle ,C.CLASS_DSTN AS classDstn ,STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ,C.CLASS_STRT_TIME) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS classStrtDateTime ,DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ,C.CLASS_STRT_TIME) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ,interval cast(C.CLASS_DRTN_TIME as unsigned) minute) AS classEndDateTime ,CONCAT(C.CLASS_DRTN_TIME, 'ë¶„') AS classDrtnTime ,C.CLASS_CURRENT_MTE AS classCurrentMte ,C.CLASS_MAX_MTE AS classMaxMte ,C.CLASS_PLACE AS classPlace ,C.CLASS_CHARGE AS classCharge ,M.MENTO_ID AS mentoId ,M.MENTO_NM AS mentoNm ,M.MENTO_DSTN AS mentoDstn ,CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD_NM AS classCtgrCdNm ,CCC.CLASS_CTGR_CD_NM AS classHrgkCtgrCdNm ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENTEE_CLASS_LIKE_L tmcll WHERE C.CLASS_ID = TMCLL.CLASS_ID and tmcll.USE_YN = 'Y') AS likeCnt ,C.CLASS_FILE_SEQNO AS classFileSeqno ,F.FILE_PATH AS classFilePath ,F.FILE_NM AS classFileNm ,COALESCE(C.UPT_DTTM, C.CRE_DTTM) AS creDttm FROM TB_CLASS_L C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENTO_I M ON C.MENTO_ID = M.MENTO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L CC ON C.CLASS_DETAIL_CTGR_CD = CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L CCC ON C.CLASS_CTGR_CD = CCC.CLASS_CTGR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_M F ON C.CLASS_FILE_SEQNO = F.FILE_SEQNO AND F.USE_YN= 'Y' WHERE C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT C.CLASS_DETAIL_TITLE AS classDetailTitle ,C.CLASS_DETAIL_FILE_SEQNO AS classDetailFileSeqno ,F.FILE_PATH AS classDetailFilePath ,F.FILE_NM AS classDetailFileNm FROM TB_CLASS_DETAIL_L C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_M F ON C.CLASS_DETAIL_FILE_SEQNO = F.FILE_SEQNO AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.CLASS_DETAIL_SEQNO
SELECT C.CLASS_PROCESS_TITLE AS classProcessTitle ,C.CLASS_PROCESS_DESC AS classProcessDesc FROM TB_CLASS_PROCESS_L C WHERE C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.CLASS_PROCESS_SEQNO

SELECT ML.MENTEE_ID AS menteeId ,ML.CLASS_ID AS classId ,C.CLASS_NM AS classNm ,C.CLASS_DSTN AS classDstn ,C.CLASS_STRT_DATE AS classStrtDate ,M.MENTO_ID AS mentoId ,M.MENTO_NM AS mentoNm ,CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD_NM AS classCtgrCdNm ,CCC.CLASS_CTGR_CD_NM AS classHrgkCtgrCdNm ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENTEE_CLASS_LIKE_L tmcll WHERE C.CLASS_ID = TMCLL.CLASS_ID and tmcll.USE_YN = 'Y') AS likeCnt FROM TB_MENTEE_CLASS_LIKE_L ML LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_L C ON C.CLASS_ID = ML.CLASS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENTO_I M ON M.MENTO_ID = C.MENTO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L CC ON C.CLASS_DETAIL_CTGR_CD = CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L CCC ON C.CLASS_CTGR_CD = CCC.CLASS_CTGR_CD WHERE ML.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ML.MENTEE_ID = #{menteeId}

SELECT C.CLASS_ID AS classId ,C.CLASS_NM AS classNm ,C.CLASS_DSTN AS classDstn ,C.CLASS_STRT_DATE AS classStrtDate ,C.CLASS_FILE_SEQNO AS classFileSeqno ,M.MENTO_ID AS mentoId ,M.MENTO_NM AS mentoNm ,CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD_NM AS classCtgrCdNm ,(SELECT CLASS_HGRK_CTGR_CD FROM TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L WHERE CLASS_CTGR_CD = CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD) AS classHrgkCtgrCdNm ,F.FILE_SEQNO AS classFileSeqno ,F.FILE_PATH AS classFilePath ,F.FILE_NM AS classFileNm ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENTEE_CLASS_LIKE_L tmcll WHERE C.CLASS_ID = TMCLL.CLASS_ID and tmcll.USE_YN = 'Y') AS likeCnt
,tmcl.MENTEE_ID AS menteeId
FROM TB_CLASS_L C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENTO_I M ON C.MENTO_ID = M.MENTO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CLASS_CATEGORY_L CC ON C.CLASS_DETAIL_CTGR_CD = CC.CLASS_CTGR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_M F ON C.CLASS_FILE_SEQNO = F.FILE_SEQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENTEE_CLASS_L tmcl ON tmcl.MENTEE_ID = #{menteeId}
WHERE C.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND C.CLASS_CTGR_CD = #{classCtgrCd}
AND C.CLASS_DETAIL_CTGR_CD = #{classDetailCtgrCd}
AND DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND M.MENTO_NM LIKE '%${searchText}%'
AND C.CLASS_NM LIKE '%${searchText}%'
AND STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ,C.CLASS_STRT_TIME) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) > SYSDATE()
AND DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(C.CLASS_STRT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ,C.CLASS_STRT_TIME) ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ,interval cast(C.CLASS_DRTN_TIME as unsigned) minute ) < SYSDATE()
AND C.CLASS_ID = tmcl.CLASS_ID
AND C.MENTO_ID = #{mentoId}
ORDER BY C.CRE_DTTM DESC
ORDER BY likeCnt DESC
